TopicTitle: Hyper Phoenix (insert random letters and numbers here)

Articles.Content:
Salutations, fellow craft builder, and allow me to introduce the Hyper Phoenix (insert random letters and numbers here):

![Xku5iUl.png](http://i.imgur.com/Xku5iUl.png)

This nuclear-powered SSTO was designed to be at the pinnacle of technology and combat. Even its lights can spark conflict (are they red or orange? lol.) It also has a massive amount of Delta-v in orbit. This amount has not been accurately measured yet, but it is somewhere in the 3-4km/s range. It can escape kerbol, with over 1.5km/s to spare.

![5EU9Wto.png](http://i.imgur.com/5EU9Wto.png)

It comes unarmed, since everyone has their own tastes for weapons. Or maybe you don't want to use it for combat. Maybe you want to launch satellites with it. Maybe you want to put a crew cabin or some seats on it and use it for a rescue mission. 

If you're wondering, it's also non-airhogging. Only two intakes per engine!

I'll admit, it has three flaws. 1: it has a low thrust to weight ratio, but not extremely low, and it gets better when you burn fuel. 2: its safety parachute is a bit dodgy, but should save at least some of the plane. 3: it has 65 parts, which is a tiny bit much, but come on, look how awesome and exotic it looks!

![tpOhnwR.png](http://i.imgur.com/tpOhnwR.png)

That's all i have to say about this plane. I hope you like it!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-15T23:39:47Z" title="03/15/2015 11:39  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 15, 2015</time> by quasarrgames**
I wanna craft file. This thing is perfect for crew transport.

[Here you go!](https://www.dropbox.com/s/4jqsaf5o8ccjaq1/Hyper%20Phoenix%20%28insert%20random%20letters%20and%20numbers%20here%29.craft?dl=0)

Sorry it took so long. Had to dust off my old dropbox account.
